title: How to explain the end time prophecies in the Bible that people say are coming true today, such as the building of the third temple - Quora

response.answer_text: THE END TIME (3RD) TEMPLE IS CLEARLY SPOKEN OF IN SCRIPTURE The 3rd temple is called the holy place in Matthew 24 end time prophecy:Matthew 24:15 So when you see standing in the HOLY PLACE ‘the abomination that causes desolation,’ spoken of through the prophet Daniel—let the reader understandEnd Time Prophecy: Daniel 12:11 From the time that the daily sacrifice is abolished and the abomination that causes desolation is set up, there will be 1,290 days.—The sacrifice is done in the TEMPLE.Revelation 1:1–3 I was given a reed like a measuring rod and was told, “Go and measure the TEMPLE of God and the altar, with its worshipers. 2 But exclude the outer court; do not measure it, because it has been given to the Gentiles. They will trample on the holy city for 42 months.Revelation 13:6 It opened its mouth to blaspheme God, and to slander his name and his DWELLING PLACE and those who live in heaven. The temple mount society in Jerusalem has been preparing all the vessels, furnishings, and altar for the 3rd temple. They are just waiting for the right time when they can access the temple mount to begin construction. This will all be in God’s timing.

How do I explain them? The Book of Revelation was a late first century plea to Christians to avoid assimilation by the Romans, written in the apocalyptic style. That’s all it means. What “people” (desperate religious fanatics) say about them is BS, wishful thinking. That’s how I explain them. We are not living in the “End Times”.
